name: Cube Ex Starve
description:
Very weird control sceme. 

P1 : keys Q, A, W, S

P2 : keys R, T, F, G

P3 : keys O, K, P, L

P4 : keys 8, 5, 9, 6 (Numpad)

The main characters are called GYONCH's.

They are VEWY hungy. And would like their apples. 

BUT NOT THE OTHER COLOUR APPLES!!! DEY ARE EVIIIIIEIEEELLL!!!!

The box. 

GYONGYONGYONGYONGYONGYONGYONGYONCH!!!!!
